ValidationRule.description: If attempting to close a iMC Case that is of the NPS Survey Follow Up type, then the comment field is required to be completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.ProfileId <> "00e30000001kms9", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Type,"NPS Survey Follow Up"), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed"), ISBLANK(Comments__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must fill in the "Comment" field with your resolution when closing a NPS Follow Up case.
